allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Use site logo from SiteConfiguration in WLJ Assistant chat widget

- Update site_context processor to pull site_name, tagline, logo_url, and
  favicon_url from SiteConfiguration model instead of hardcoded values
- Update chat_widget.html to use site_logo_url with fallback to static logo
- Logo uploaded in Admin Console > Site Configuration now appears in chat header

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add Cloudinary for persistent media storage

- Add cloudinary and django-cloudinary-storage packages
- Configure STORAGES to use CloudinaryStorage for media files
- Add fallback to local FileSystemStorage if Cloudinary not configured
- Requires CLOUDINARY_CLOUD_NAME, CLOUDINARY_API_KEY, CLOUDINARY_API_SECRET env vars

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
Bash(cmd /c ".venv\Scripts\activate && set SECRET_KEY=dev-secret-key-for-testing && python manage.py makemigrations users --name add_biometric_login")
Bash(powershell -Command "cd C:\dbawholelifejourney; $env:SECRET_KEY=''dev-secret-key''; .\.venv\Scripts\Activate.ps1; python manage.py makemigrations users --name add_biometric_login")

Bash(powershell -Command "$env:SECRET_KEY=''dev-secret-key''; cd ''C:\Users\danny\.claude-worktrees\dbawholelifejourney\bold-fermat''; python manage.py makemigrations users --name add_biometric_login")
